The Shanxi Luzigou Coal Mine is a shaft coal mine located in Luzigou Village, Dongguan Town, Baode County, Xinzhou City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation & Sales Group Luzigou Coal Industry Co Ltd
